title: [Warrior Guild, East Hall]
description: Only a scattering of light reaches the cool stone from the shaded street outside.  A longbow and a sheaf of arrows stand ready in a niche next to the slit in the stone wall.
Only a scattering of moonlight reaches the cool stone from the street outside.  A longbow and a sheaf of arrows stand ready in a niche next to the slit in the stone wall.
